root: ^Fantastic! I can't wait to read what you think about us?
^Oh, and you have to make sure to watch the show! All the acrobats are excited to impress you.
^Well, I look forward to being impressed.
^You know, while I have you, can I ask you a few questions?

s: ^What kind of work do you get up to here?
^What's your favorite thing about working here?

Choice1: ^I'm an acrobat, I'm here for the flying, the vaults, the trapeze...
^Anything that sees me flying through the air like a bird.
Choice2: ^Sure. Every time I get to perform is a dream come true.
^It all seems so simple nowadays, but I love seeing everyone in the audience in awe.
^Yeah. Some fans even give me flowers after a good performance.
^The truth is, I hardly need any more. I already have the one on my uniform.
^The rest just go in my dressing room.
DONE: ^That's lovely. Thank you so much. It'll all fit nicely into the piece.
